mapper.select: select q.package_id,q.package_name,q.price,q.time_num,q.time_unit from t_package_hospital t , t_package q where t.package_id = q.package_id and t.hospital_id = #{hospitalId}
select package_id, package_name, price, insert_dt, update_dt, time_unit, time_num from t_package where package_id = #{packageId} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into t_member_package_service (sid, member_package_id, service_name, remain_time, total_time, service_type,service_code) values (#{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{memberPackageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remainTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serviceType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{serviceCode})
mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(t.insert_dt,'%m') month, count(t.sid) count from t_member_package t where t.is_valid = 1 and DATE_FORMAT(t.insert_dt,'%Y') = #{year} and t.package_status=1 and t.doctor_id = #{doctorId} group by DATE_FORMAT(t.insert_dt, '%Y-%m')

select sid, member_id, doctor_id, package_id, order_id ,DATE_FORMAT( start_dt,'%Y-%m-%d %T') start_dt ,DATE_FORMAT( end_dt,'%Y-%m-%d %T') end_dt ,DATE_FORMAT( insert_dt,'%Y-%m-%d %T') insert_dt ,update_dt, package_name, price, package_status from t_member_package where is_valid = 1 and sid = #{memberPackageId} limit 1

select t.member_id from t_member_package t , t_member_package_service q where t.sid = q.member_package_id and t.is_valid = 1 and q.is_valid = 1 and q.service_code = #{serviceCode} and now() BETWEEN t.start_dt and t.end_dt and q.remain_time > 0 group by t.member_id

select distinct package_id, package_name from t_member_package where is_valid = 1 and doctor_id in
#{item}

select p.member_id,p.doctor_id from t_member_package p join t_member_package_service s on p.sid =s.member_package_id WHERE p.package_id = 123 and p.is_valid = 1 and s.is_valid = 1 and 0 < s.remain_time and now() < p.END_DT GROUP BY p.member_id

select sid, member_package_id, service_name, remain_time, total_time, service_type, insert_dt, update_dt, service_code from t_member_package_service where is_valid = 1 and member_package_id = #{memberPackageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select q.insert_dt,q.member_package_id,q.remain_time,q.service_code ,q.service_name,q.service_type,q.sid,q.total_time,q.update_dt from t_member_package t , t_member_package_service q where t.is_valid = 1 and q.is_valid = 1 and t.sid = q.member_package_id and t.member_id = #{memberId} and t.doctor_id = #{doctorId} and now() BETWEEN t.start_dt and t.end_dt and q.remain_time > 0 and q.service_code = #{serviceCode, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler} order by q.insert_dt limit 1
mapper.update: update t_member_package_service t set t.remain_time = t.remain_time - 1 where t.sid = #{sid}
mapper.select: select sid, member_id, doctor_id, package_id, order_id ,DATE_FORMAT( start_dt,'%Y-%m-%d %T') start_dt ,DATE_FORMAT( end_dt,'%Y-%m-%d %T') end_dt ,DATE_FORMAT( insert_dt,'%Y-%m-%d %T') insert_dt ,update_dt, package_name, price, package_status from t_member_package where is_valid = 1 and date_format(end_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{date} order by insert_dt
select package_id,package_name,price,insert_dt,update_dt,time_unit,time_num from t_package
mapper.update: update t_member_package set is_valid = 0 where sid = #{sid}
mapper.select: select sid sid,member_id memberId,doctor_id doctorId,package_id packageId, order_id orderId,DATE_FORMAT(start_dt,'%Y-%m-%d')startDt,DATE_FORMAT(end_dt,'%Y-%m-%d')endDt,DATE_FORMAT(insert_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') insertDt,DATE_FORMAT(update_dt,'%Y-%m-%d')udateDt, package_name packageName,price price,package_status packageStatus from t_member_package where member_id = #{memberId} and doctor_id = #{doctorId} and is_valid = 1 and package_status = 1
mapper.update:
update t_member_package_service t set is_valid = 0
and member_package_id = #{memberPackageId}
mapper.select: select sid,member_id,doctor_id,package_id,order_id,start_dt,end_dt,insert_dt,update_dt,package_name,price,package_status FROM t_member_package where is_valid = 1 and package_status = 1 and now() BETWEEN start_dt and end_dt and member_id = #{memberId}
